Texts.Eng: I've been working on a new piece of tech that enables the user to perform a jump in mid-air, allowing them to reach incredible new heights! Unfortunately, I require a few more components before I can finish it. ^green;Could you bring me ^orange;10 Silver Bars^white;?
Marvelous! With these additions the ^orange;Pulse Jump Tech^white; is ready for testing! Come and speak to me again if you'd like to help.
